Name: Vegas Slot
About the game: Casino addict? This slot machine is made for you! Enjoy the game and atmosphere of your favorite casino! There are thousands of different slot machines in the world. In Vegas Slot there are 7 different machines available like the 3x3, 4x5 or 3x5 (different number of lines and columns) but with a single theme with a modern and chic style. May the luck be with you! Features : ■ 7 different types of slot machines! ■ A unique theme! ■ Level system! ■ Casino atmosphere!
